recipesJson.name: Lemon Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Jcamp
recipesJson.description: A simple Lemon cheesecake. I will be updating this as it steeps

reviews.text: The lemon portion of this on day one was very overpowering, it was like lemon Pine-Sol. By day 3 the lemon disappeared into the mix entirely. I now taste no lemon, a very good cheesecake though! I don't know if I got a bad batch of Lemon Sicily or what, but this was my experience with this recipe.
This doesn't need updating. It's a perfect lemon cheesecake.
